clauses.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to you
clauses.description: The Agreements can be updated at any time, including in a way that negatively affects user rights, without notifying before or after the changes.
clauses.clause_text: It is recommended to look at this page regularly, to check if something has been updated/modified/changed. With it, the date at the top of this page can help you, identify if and when we made changes to this page.

case.text: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to you

clauses.title: Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent to changes of terms merely from your usage.
clauses.description: The Service infers your acceptance from your continued usage, instead of prompting you to read the new Terms and asking for direct consent. This doesn’t apply to services that have no way to seek consent from users through their contact details or an account.
clauses.clause_text: By accessing or using the Service, you agree to these Terms of Services.

case.text: Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent to changes of terms merely from your usage.

clauses.title: No need to register
clauses.description: This service can be used without providing a user profile.

clauses.title: An onion site accessible over Tor is provided
clauses.description: Tor is a software for anonymous communication that directs Internet traffic through an overlay network. Onion sites are only available through Tor browser and provide additional security and anonymity to users.

case.text: An onion site accessible over Tor is provided

clauses.title: Your personal data is not sold
clauses.description: This service makes an explicit promise not to sell "personal data" of users.
clauses.clause_text: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties

case.text: Your personal data is not sold

clauses.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service
clauses.description: Most browsers allow users to set preferences related to cookies storage. You may choose to block all cookies (including first-party cookies), but it may impact your use of this service and you may not be able to access some or any of the features provided.
clauses.clause_text: These cookies are necessary for the Service to function properly.

case.text: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service

clauses.title: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service
clauses.description: The service assumes no liability for any damages the user incurs, including tangible (e.g. profits) and intangible losses (e.g. data), resulting from the use or inability to use the service or any other matter relating to the service.
clauses.clause_text: We are not liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising out of your use of the Service.

case.text: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service

clauses.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
clauses.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.

case.text: There is a date of the last update of the agreements

clauses.clause_text: his includes, but is not limited to, scraping PriEco results

clauses.title: You are prohibited from attempting to gain unauthorized access to other computer systems
clauses.description: The service does not allow any attempts at hacking or otherwise gaining unauthorized access to other users' computers.
clauses.clause_text: accessing or attempting to access our database, and similar actions.

case.text: You are prohibited from attempting to gain unauthorized access to other computer systems

clauses.title: This service is only available to users over a certain age
clauses.description: The Services are intended for users who are at least a certain age. If you are younger than the age required then you are prohibited from using the Service.
clauses.clause_text: You must be at least 13 years old to use our services

case.text: This service is only available to users over a certain age

clauses.title: First-party cookies are used
clauses.description: First-party cookies only belong to the domain of the service and not a third party.

clauses.clause_text: JojoYou website temporarily collects and stores your IP address for 30 minutes.

case.text: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location

clauses.title: Third parties are involved in operating the service
clauses.clause_text: We use 3rd party APIs to retrieve search results, which means we send them the search query and information set by user: location, language, date filter and safe search filter (“NSFW protection”)

case.text: Third parties are involved in operating the service
